properties.Non-point sources of pollution: Improper discard of waste (Soap & shampoo packets) near the major spring
properties.Recommended water quality improvement me:
Preparing a separate bins/place for disposing waste
Awareness programme on how to dispose household waste properly and converting them to usable products 
Facilitating garbage collection

properties.Non-point sources of pollution: Addition of agrochemicals to water paths - Wahalagama
properties.Recommended water quality improvement me: Awareness programmes on how to use agrochamicals and dispose containers properly after use

properties.Non-point sources of pollution: Addition of agrochemicals to water paths - The cultivated Fields on both sides of the Badaulu road
properties.Recommended water quality improvement me: Awareness programmes on how to use agrochamicals and dispose containers properly after use
